name: Problematic Paper Planes
description:
Fight through rounds of enemies by shooting them until you fulfill the point requirement for each level.  Survive rounds to recover any lost health. Upon completing the final round, the game will go into endless mode where you survive for as long as possible and attain a high score.

This 2D top-down shooter is my first attempt at creating enemy AI and creating an open play area with a round-based system. I like to think of this game as a paper airplane version of COD Zombies.  Hope you enjoyed this title.

Comment any suggestions down below!
